description:
FLYXY - RC PLANE AIR COMBAT FLIGHT SIMULATOR

 

Flyxy - RC Plane Air Combat Flight Simulator, the best air combat flight simulator.

Become the king of the sky in this RC plane flight air combat simulator.

! Early access !

Be aware: the game is still under heavy development.

It’s currently in an early development stage. You can try it and leave feedback but be aware: they are different bugs, currently, you can’t save your progress, and the crafting list has yet to be filled. There are some materials you can gather, but some are still to be developed. 

 

A big open world:

In Flyxy – RC Plane Air Combat you can explore a big open world. Yes, exactly, a completely free-roam game. Take your favorite plane and fly wherever you want! Find secrets, complete mini games, and more!

Explore the entire map, exterior, and even interior buildings.

Be aware: other RC planes are trying to conquer the territory and may shoot you on sight!

 

Awesome jets, aircraft, and airplanes:

Collect and fly a huge amount of jets, airplanes, aircraft, and more! Customize your plane and take it for a flight!

Dogfight and destroy the enemies’ airplanes with some of the most explosive and spectacular aerial combat game on mobile.

 

Game features:

-Open world -Free roam -Customizable aircraft -Awesome graphic -Big game -Extreme flight simulator

 

Upcoming updates:

-New aircraft and airplanes -New upgrade system (upgrade weapons etc) -New customization system -New bosses and boss -New missions -Mini games activities -Much more
